Question: Who can raise the Gift Redemption request.
Answers: 1. FRW or BDS can raise the Gift redemption request on behalf of mechanic.

Question: What is the eligibility for Gift Redemption
Answers: 1. Mechanic should have minimum 800+ balance points in his account to request for redemption

Question: How Redemption cycle work
Answers: 1. BDS/UKU-FR can raised the request for redemption via Bosch Infocom Mobile App.
2. Zonal Manager will approve the request.
3. HO will approved the request after getting approved by ZM.
4. BMD will accept the claim and upload handover Photo, Invoice Copy and Acknowledgment Letter. - in case of claim raised by UKU FR.
5. UKU BMD will accept the claim and BDS will upload the handover photos
6. Agency will verify the Gift receipt with mechanic
7. CTG will issue the Credit Note to BMD

Question: Where can track the UKU Points or claim details
Answers: 1.user can login to rewards portal and track the points and claim in UKU Passbook option available under UKU Menu
